attributes.action: Will the Minister of Health please investigate the allegations in Prof. Bush's book "700 Vitamin C Secrets - and 1,000 not so secret for doctors!"?
attributes.additional_details: Investigation is required of a Medical education syllabus that appears to be biased towards 'toximolecular' drugs to the near exclusion or natural "orthomolecular" substances with consequent extremely high adverse reaction death rates completely unknown to vitamin and nutrient related treatments. An example is the virtually 100% success rate in the treatment of viral and bacterial infections by injected, non-toxic vitamin C, including MRSA cure.
